Code block

A Python Example:

def quote():
    # Socrates
    print('The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.')

A HTML Example:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>quote</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Maya Angelou -->
    <p>Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.</p>
</body>
</html>

A C Example:

#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
    // Confucius
    printf("Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.\n");
    return 0;
}
